@package engine-io-snap
@version 1.0.3

module Network.EngineIO.Snap

-- | A drop in <a>ServerAPI</a> that works in any Snap monad - including
--   both <tt>Handler</tt> and <tt>Snap</tt>.
snapAPI :: MonadSnap m => ServerAPI m
